bestTargets.thread: @OpenAIDevs - Codex rolling out to NVIDIA 30K engineers

analysis.bestTimeOfDay: Evening (8-10 PM) — aligns with peak X traffic
analysis.optimalParentThreadSize: 100K-500K views — large enough for exposure, small enough to not get buried

followerGrowth.note: First full week — all 27 followers are net new. 5 verified. Strong ratio for a new account.

recommendations: Double down on OpenAI/AI coding tool threads — they're the highest volume AND most engaged vertical right now
Target more 100K-500K view threads for replies; the 3.4M thread is great for impressions but replies get buried. Sweet spot is 100K-300K where your reply can stay visible.
Add 1-2 original insight tweets per day (not threads, not replies) — short takes on breaking AI news. This builds your own content library and gives followers something to RT.
